title: Adversarial Node Placement in Decentralized Federated Learning: Maximum Spanning-Centrality Strategy and Performance Analysis
summary: As Federated Learning (FL) becomes more widespread, there is growing interest in its decentralized variants. Decentralized FL leverages the benefits of fast and energy-efficient device-to-device communications to obviate the need for a central server. However, this opens the door to new security vulnerabilities as well.
